description: This Java class 'GlobalExceptionHandler' provides centralized handling of exceptions within a Spring Boot application, producing consistent error responses for various exception types.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring Boot RestControllerAdvice class that handles various exception types and returns structured error responses.

methods.name: base
methods.description: Creates a standardized response map containing timestamp, status, error, and message details.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundException and returns a 404 error response.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation-related exceptions and returns a 400 error response.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions and returns a 500 error response.
